Package org.sopra.api.util.scenarioloader

Class ScenarioLoader

java.lang.Object
org.sopra.api.util.scenarioloader.ScenarioLoader
public final class ScenarioLoader
extends java.lang.Object
Loads scenarios from the XML-file.

    • reload

      public static Scenario reload() throws ScenarioLoadingException
      Reloads the last loaded scenario.
      Returns:
      The scenario from the file.
      Throws:
      ScenarioLoadingException - if something went wrong while loading. For example, if the scenario file was invalid.

      Returns:

    • loadScenario

      public static Scenario loadScenario​(java.io.InputStream scenarioFile, EnergyNodeConfig energyNodeConfig, PowerLineConfig powerLineConfig, BuildingConfig buildingConfig) throws ScenarioLoadingException

      Loads a scenario from a given file stream with a given configuration.

      Attention: XStream should get permission for XML conversion: http://x-stream.github.io/security.html

      Info: Since JDK 8.0 introduced the module system, some of XStream conversion methods would do an illegal access. (https://github.com/x-stream/xstream/issues/101). To avoid problems with modules you have to override the setupConverters() & register the converter priorities by your self.

      Parameters:
      scenarioFile - The InputStream to the scenario file.
      energyNodeConfig - The energy node configuration.
      powerLineConfig - The power line configuration.
      buildingConfig - Building configurations
      Returns:
      The scenario from the file.
      Throws:
      ScenarioLoadingException - if something went wrong while loading. For example, if the scenario file was invalid.
